Claim: "Someone billion people would face unlivable conditions."
Implication: "The internal cohesion of nation-states like the US and China would unravel."
Referring expressions: Someone, billion people, unlivable conditions.  Nation-states, US, China
Formula: (exists c (exists a (exists b (IsSomeone(a) and (AreBillionPeople(b) and AreUnlivableConditions(c))))) & (forall i (forall h (forall g (  IsUnraveling(g,h) ->   AreUnlivableConditions(i)))))) -> (exists e (exists d (exists f (IsNationState(d) and (IsUnraveling(e,f) or IsUnraveling(f,e))))))
